tAlerts.tTimeEmpty: Please fill in the time field!

tVersicles.0: According to the number of days you have spied the earth, forty days, each day representing one year, you will take your iniquities forty years on you and experience my displeasure. Numbers 14:34
tVersicles.1: For I have already fixed the years of your iniquity, according to the number of days, three hundred and ninety days; and you will take the iniquity of the house of Israel. And when you have fulfilled these days, you will become to lie on your right side, and you will take the iniquity of the house of Judah forty days, one day I gave you each year. Then you will direct your face towards the siege of Jerusalem, with your arm uncovered, and you will prophesy against it. Ezekiel 4: 5-7
